name: TBD (ratuspro, Game Dev Técnico, guganunes6, Renas, corvvu, ZeCaetano)
name_original: TBD (ratuspro, Game Dev Técnico, guganunes6, Renas, corvvu, ZeCaetano)
description:
TO BE DEFINED

Our hero marches through the dystopian world of Contrasts ,trying to find the tokens that will allow him to escape the Limbo.
Travel along him and try  to unlock the  the doors that will allow him to  fullfill his fate in the real world.

We are part of our college game development group, Game Dev Técnico, which can be found here on Itch.io, and on Facebook and Twitter!

Controls:

Q - Rotate Left
E - Rotate Right
W - Walk Forward
Space bar - Shoot to activate switches
